header.title: Environment Diagnostics Dashboard
header.description: Verify the installation status and version of Node.js, Python, Next.js, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, FastAPI, and pnpm.

notices.fetchError: Unable to fetch diagnostics, please try again.

table.title: Tool results
table.description: Displays installation status, version numbers, and command output.

footer.tip: The service runs on port 3000. Start it with <command>npm run dev</command>.

system.title: Server system information
system.description: Details about the host operating system, CPU and memory.

auth.title: Account required
auth.headline: Sign in to continue
auth.description: Use your email address or Google account to access the diagnostics dashboard.

requirement.title: Login required
requirement.description: Please sign in before running environment diagnostics.
